Hi, I'm Mengzhan (Jhan) Liufu!

I am a college senior at the University of Chicago. I major in Computer Science, Physics and Economics. I have worked on various research projects and produced publications since 2020, mentored by Professor Jai Yu, Professor Henry Hoffmann, Professor Bozhi Tian and other amazing scholars. I am experienced with machine learning, computer systems, neuromodulation algorithms and system neuroscience.

Academic interests

I am applying to graduate school in Fall 2024! My overarching academic interest lies in interfacing with the human body, especially the brain. I am particularly interested in the following venues:

  • Interaction with the brain through bioelectronics and genetic modulation approaches
  • Implantable devices empowered by machine learning and edge computing techniques
  • Multimodal machine learning for healthcare
